2.2 File encoding: UTF-8:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='FileTabCharacter'>
        <property name='eachLine' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='FileLength'>
        <property name='max' value='2000'/>
    </module>
    <module name='LineLength'>
        <property name='max' value='120'/>
        <property name='ignorePattern' value='^import\ .*$'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpHeader'>
        <property name='headerFile' value='path/to/header'/>
    </module>
    <module name='PackageDeclaration'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$'/>
        <property name='severity' value='warning'/>
        <property name='ignoreFormat' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='FileLength'>
        <property name='max' value='3000'/>
    </module>"
}

4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='LineLength'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='max' value='100'/>
        <property name='ignorePattern' value='^import\s.*|^package\s.*|^.*\{\s*$|^.*\}\s*$'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='METHOD_DEF'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, DOT, METHOD_REF'/>
        <property name='option' value='eol'/>
    </module>"
}

4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, COLON, METHOD_REF, QUESTION, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='BNOT, DEC, INC, LNOT, UNARY_MINUS, UNARY_PLUS'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='singleLine' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='RPAREN'/>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='BAND, BOR, BSR, BXOR, DIV, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LE, LOR, LT, MINUS, MOD, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, QUESTION, SL, SR, STAR'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN'/>
        <property name='option' value='no'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='COLON'/>
        <property name='option' value='no'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='DIV'/>
        <property name='option' value='no'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='SL'/>
        <property name='option' value='no'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='tokens' value='SR'/>
        <property name='option' value='no'/>
    </module>"
}
